summary: MY FIAT 500 MANUAL TRANMISSION WOULD NOT GO INTO GEAR WHEN I WAS ON THE HIGHWAY  THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH CLUTCH DIAPHRAGM SPRING CAUSEINGTHE CAR NOT TO SHIFT THE RECALL WASTO REPLACE THE CLUTCH PEDAL OVER TRAVEL I TOLD THE FIAT DEALER THEY SHOULD CHECK THE CLUTCH FIRST TO SEE IF THERE WAS ANY DAMAGE NOW MY CLUTCH WENT THE CAR GIVES YOU NO SIGN WHEN ITS GOING TO FAIL VERY DANGEROUS CAR WAS IN MOTION WHEN IN HAPPEND
